attributes.action: Restrict the number of imposed Prime Ministers  to one per Electoral Term.
attributes.additional_details: Look at the situation we are in currently.
attributes.background: We all understand that a Prime Minister might die in office, or need to step down for personal reasons, but to have more than one leader imposed by the Party should automatically trigger a General Election, however long the Parliamentary term has left to run.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
